about.title: About
about.description:
Hi, my name is Henrique Galinha, born in 1999. I am a former Special Forces paratrooper with 5 years of service, where I also worked as a parachute packer and instructor for multiple courses.

I thrive in team environments, stay calm and focused under pressure, and embrace challenges as opportunities to grow. My military background has given me strong discipline, adaptability, and problem-solving skills, qualities I now apply to my work in technology and programming.

I also have a passion for design and its ability to inspire and connect with people, blending creativity with technical precision to create meaningful digital experiences.

contacts.title: Contacts
contacts.subtitle: Feel free to reach out anytime, and I’ll be happy to take the time to address your needs :)

frotgest.title: FROTGEST
frotgest.text:
The FROTGEST logo features vibrant colors and a modern, professional design. The pin with a gear symbolizes technology and tracking, while the smooth typography conveys trust and innovation.

Frotgest makes equipment fleet management easy, enabling simple and efficient control of inventory, maintenance, and usage.

vasto.title: VASTO IMPÉRIO Lda.
vasto.text:
Vasto Império Lda. simplifies the buying and reselling of industrial shelving, providing reliable solutions for new and used equipment, ensuring efficient and high-quality storage.

The Vasto Império logo blends bold colors and strong lines to reflect reliability and structure. The clean design represents the company’s focus on buying and selling new and used industrial shelving and racks.

frotgest.title: FROTGEST
frotgest.text: A website showcasing the Frotgest app, where users can explore the product, see pricing, and understand its features for managing a fleet of work tools. The design is clean and professional, with a focus on clarity and user-friendly navigation to present the app’s functionalities effectively.

frotgestApp.title: FROTGEST MOBILE APP
frotgestApp.text: The Frotgest mobile app allows companies to manage and track all their tools. Users can add new items, manage locations, update information, and check out tools using QR codes or NFC. The app features an intuitive and modern interface designed for quick access and easy operation on the go.

frotgestAdmin.title: FROTGEST ADMINISTRATION PANEL
frotgestAdmin.text: A web-based panel that mirrors the mobile app’s functionality, providing comprehensive management of equipment. Users can track, edit, and manage all tools through a desktop interface. The design prioritizes efficiency and organization, ensuring complex tasks are handled smoothly.

portbridge.title: PORTBRIDGE
portbridge.text: An engineering company website specialized in bridges, offering truck rentals equipped for supporting bridge construction projects. The site features a professional, industrial design with clear service descriptions and easy access to vehicle and project information.

danau.title: DANAU
danau.text: A website for a burger and traditional beach dishes restaurant, displaying the menu and allowing online orders. The design is vibrant and appetizing, combining imagery of the dishes with a user-friendly layout that makes browsing and ordering simple and enjoyable.
